en.title: Letter of Appreciation "Hope for Children" Charity Drive.!

meta.description: Certificate of appreciation to Mr. Paul Ting, CEO FusionExcel International for participation in the projects and programs for the Lighthouse Center for Children Foundation.
meta.keyword: Certificate of appreciation, Mr. Paul Ting, Lighthouse Center for Children Foundation, 7th February 2009, Marikina City
meta.author: klhunter
